component.name: Fcitx
component.summary: An input method framework with extension support

description.p: Fcitx [ˈfaɪtɪks] is an input method framework with extension support. Currently it supports Linux and Unix systems like FreeBSD. It has three built-in Input Method Engine, Pinyin, QuWei and Table-based input methods.
Fcitx tries to provide a native feeling under all desktop as well as a light weight core. You can easily customize it to fit your requirements.
